TopicTitle: Quick saving while after burner is on then loading that save reverts panther to cruise

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.5 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 | CPU: AMD Ryzen 3200G | GPU: 1050 TI | RAM: 16GB

 

So I quicksaved while the afterburner on the panther engine was on, then when i loaded the quicksave the PAM said "afterburner" but it was still on cruise.

 

How to replicate:

Step 1: Build a plane with panther engines

Step 2: Make the plane fly (very hard)

Step 3: Quicksave while the afterburners on the panther engine is on

Step 4: Load the quicksave
